data.title: Jacinto Benavente
data.meta_description: Sold for $296 | One of the foremost Spanish dramatists of the 20th century (1866-1954). He was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1922. AQS in Spanish,
data.text: One of the foremost Spanish dramatists of the 20th century (1866-1954). He was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1922. AQS in Spanish, on a 7.25 x 5 off-white sheet. Quote reads, (translated): “A true love is not the one that forgives many defects but the one that does not see them.” Signed at the conclusion by Benavente, with small collector’s pencil notations below signature. A uniform shade of toning, otherwise fine condition. RR Auction COA.
